author: Special Correspondent THOOTHUKUDI
title: Volunteers to aid civic body in disbursing relief
description: District Collector Sandeep Nanduri has informed that 1,500 volunteers will be involved in the disbursal of COVID–19 relief at the doorsteps of senior citizens, physically challenged and also those who
content:
District Collector Sandeep Nanduri has informed that 1,500 volunteers will be involved in the disbursal of COVID19 relief at the doorsteps of senior citizens, physically challenged and also those who are in home quarantine.
 Speaking to reporters here on Fri… [+1007 chars]
